examples.example: 只要我们愿意努力，就一定能改变自己的命运。

translate.english: As long as we are willing to work hard, we will definitely be able to change our own destiny.

examples.example: 他通过自己的坚持和奋斗，成功改变了生活的困境。

translate.english: He successfully changed the difficult situation of life through his own perseverance and struggle.

examples.example: 我们可以通过不断学习来改变自己的认知水平。

translate.english: We can change our cognitive level by constantly learning.
